content.text: I broke my arm when I was a child, but it healed well.
I remember running around in the woods with my siblings, getting lost and having to find our way back home.
That sounds like a fun adventure!
It was, we were all laughing so hard. What is your favorite way to spend time with your family?
I love going to dance lessons with my boyfriend. We are both really enjoying it and it is a great way to spend time together.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I don't do much dancing, but I do like to go on road trips with my Ford truck.
That sounds like a great way to see the country. I would love to go on a cross-country road trip someday.
I've done it a few times and it is always an amazing experience.
I'm glad you've had a positive experience with it. I'm sure I would too.
I hope you get to experience it someday.
Thank you! I'm sure I will.
